Title: R Is for Romeo
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Chip Johannessen, Patrick Harbinson
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Elizabeth Marvel, F. Murray Abraham
Plot: Carrie and Quinn make a discovery. Keane makes a decision. Max finds trouble.
